# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in split(lowercase(text)), r"[^\w\s]|_")
        if width(current_line) + width(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= " $word"
        end
    end
    
    # Add the last line to lines
    push!(lines, current_line)

    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage
text = """
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam vel metus at justo posuere vulputate. Sed ac urna facilisis, hendrerit lectus vitae, rutrum odio.
"""

wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
